EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-11-14 Know Before You Go AWS ReInvent.ES-20181105-Invite Send 2b.Subjec
EmailTemplate.subject: What You Should Know Before AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn/]]> Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You're invited to join our 3x re:Invent attendee and community blogger, Eric Wright, as he shares his top tips for you get the most out of AWS re:Invent 2018 on Wednesday, November 14th at 11 a.m. ET.
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>
In this live 30-minute live webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>, you will find out:
- What to expect at AWS re:Invent 2018 - What are must-see sessions - How to tune into the conference virtually
I hope to see you there!
Regards, Andrew
PS. If you are not attending re:Invent or you want to learn how to save at least 30% on your cloud bill each month, watch this on-demand webcast "Using AI Continuously to Maximize Cloud Cost Savings <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-using-artificial-intelligence-to-continuously-maximize-cloud-cost-saving]]>".
